Competitive shooter thats been a stable for video games since its origin over 20 years ago. 

+ Game is always evolving.
+ Huge community.
+ Graphics and Sound are good.
+ Gunplay is good, Maps are good and seasons change the maps around giving good variety.
+ Custom games and player hosted servers provide essentially unlimited re-playability and different game types.
+ Casual game modes if you dont want to play with smelly try-hards and cheaters.
+ Ranked game modes if you dont want to play with filthy casuals and children.
+ Timesink, Great replayability.
+ A lot of fun with friends.

- Ranked games can be stressful, hate filled racial nightmares.
- Ranked playlist is the cesspit of humanity.
- Cheaters and "hackers" can and will ruin some of your games. 
- Skins are the biggest ponzi scheme of the 21'st century.
- Hope you like de-dust2.
